I would recommend "The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt" as it is a biographical movie that covers the early years of America's 26th President, Theodore Roosevelt.

The movie follows Theodore Roosevelt from his childhood in New York City to his service as a officer in the United States Army.

Through his service and leadership in the military, Theodore Roosevelt went on to become one of the most influential political leaders in American history.
